briefdescription.para: Deinitializes the USARTx peripheral registers to their default reset values.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the USARTx peripheral according to the specified parameters in the USART_InitStruct .

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
pointer to a USART_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the specified USART peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Fills each USART_InitStruct member with its default value.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to a USART_InitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

briefdescription.para: Initializes the USARTx peripheral Clock according to the specified parameters in the USART_ClockInitStruct .

parameterdescription.para: where x can be 1, 2, 3 to select the USART peripheral.
pointer to a USART_ClockInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the specified USART peripheral.

simplesect.para: The Smart Card and Synchronous modes are not available for UART4 and UART5.

briefdescription.para: Fills each USART_ClockInitStruct member with its default value.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to a USART_ClockInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the specified USART peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the USARTx peripheral. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the specified USART interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the USART interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_IT_CTS: CTS change interrupt (not available for UART4 and UART5)
USART_IT_LBD: LIN Break detection interrupt
USART_IT_TXE: Transmit Data Register empty interrupt
USART_IT_TC: Transmission complete interrupt
USART_IT_RXNE: Receive Data register not empty interrupt
USART_IT_IDLE: Idle line detection interrupt
USART_IT_PE: Parity Error interrupt
USART_IT_ERR: Error interrupt(Frame error, noise error, overrun error)
new state of the specified USARTx interrupts. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USARTs DMA interface.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the DMA request. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
USART_DMAReq_Tx: USART DMA transmit request
USART_DMAReq_Rx: USART DMA receive request
new state of the DMA Request sources. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

simplesect.para: The DMA mode is not available for UART5 except in the STM32 High density value line devices(STM32F10X_HD_VL).

briefdescription.para: Sets the address of the USART node.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
Indicates the address of the USART node.

briefdescription.para: Selects the USART WakeUp method.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the USART wakeup method. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_WakeUp_IdleLine: WakeUp by an idle line detection
USART_WakeUp_AddressMark: WakeUp by an address mark

briefdescription.para: Determines if the USART is in mute mode or not.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the USART mute mode. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Sets the USART LIN Break detection length.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the LIN break detection length. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_LINBreakDetectLength_10b: 10-bit break detection
USART_LINBreakDetectLength_11b: 11-bit break detection

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USARTs LIN mode.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the USART LIN mode. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Transmits single data through the USARTx peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
the data to transmit.

briefdescription.para: Returns the most recent received data by the USARTx peripheral.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
received data.

briefdescription.para: Transmits break characters.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

briefdescription.para: Sets the specified USART guard time.

parameterdescription.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the USART peripheral.
specifies the guard time.

simplesect.para: The guard time bits are not available for UART4 and UART5.

briefdescription.para: Sets the system clock prescaler.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
specifies the prescaler clock.

simplesect.para: The function is used for IrDA mode with UART4 and UART5.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USARTs Smart Card mode.

parameterdescription.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the USART peripheral.
new state of the Smart Card mode. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

simplesect.para: The Smart Card mode is not available for UART4 and UART5.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables NACK transmission.

parameterdescription.para: where x can be 1, 2 or 3 to select the USART peripheral.
new state of the NACK transmission. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

simplesect.para: The Smart Card mode is not available for UART4 and UART5.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USARTs Half Duplex communication.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the USART Communication. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USART's 8x oversampling mode.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the USART one bit sampling method. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

simplesect.para: This function has to be called before calling USART_Init() function in order to have correct baudrate Divider value.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USART's one bit sampling method.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the USART one bit sampling method. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Configures the USART's IrDA interface.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the IrDA mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_IrDAMode_LowPower
USART_IrDAMode_Normal

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables the USART's IrDA interface.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.
new state of the IrDA mode. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the specified USART flag is set or not.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_FLAG_CTS: CTS Change flag (not available for UART4 and UART5)
USART_FLAG_LBD: LIN Break detection flag
USART_FLAG_TXE: Transmit data register empty flag
USART_FLAG_TC: Transmission Complete flag
USART_FLAG_RXNE: Receive data register not empty flag
USART_FLAG_IDLE: Idle Line detection flag
USART_FLAG_ORE: OverRun Error flag
USART_FLAG_NE: Noise Error flag
USART_FLAG_FE: Framing Error flag
USART_FLAG_PE: Parity Error flag
new state of USART_FLAG (SET or RESET).

briefdescription.para: Clears the USARTx's pending flags.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the flag to clear. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
USART_FLAG_CTS: CTS Change flag (not available for UART4 and UART5).
USART_FLAG_LBD: LIN Break detection flag.
USART_FLAG_TC: Transmission Complete flag.
USART_FLAG_RXNE: Receive data register not empty flag.

listitem.para: PE (Parity error), FE (Framing error), NE (Noise error), ORE (OverRun error) and IDLE (Idle line detected) flags are cleared by software sequence: a read operation to USART_SR register (USART_GetFlagStatus()) followed by a read operation to USART_DR register (USART_ReceiveData()).
RXNE flag can be also cleared by a read to the USART_DR register (USART_ReceiveData()).
TC flag can be also cleared by software sequence: a read operation to USART_SR register (USART_GetFlagStatus()) followed by a write operation to USART_DR register (USART_SendData()).
TXE flag is cleared only by a write to the USART_DR register (USART_SendData()).

briefdescription.para: Checks whether the specified USART interrupt has occurred or not.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the USART interrupt source to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_IT_CTS: CTS change interrupt (not available for UART4 and UART5)
USART_IT_LBD: LIN Break detection interrupt
USART_IT_TXE: Tansmit Data Register empty interrupt
USART_IT_TC: Transmission complete interrupt
USART_IT_RXNE: Receive Data register not empty interrupt
USART_IT_IDLE: Idle line detection interrupt
USART_IT_ORE: OverRun Error interrupt
USART_IT_NE: Noise Error interrupt
USART_IT_FE: Framing Error interrupt
USART_IT_PE: Parity Error interrupt
new state of USART_IT (SET or RESET).

briefdescription.para: Clears the USARTx's interrupt pending bits.

parameterdescription.para: Select the USART or the UART peripheral. This parameter can be one of the following values: USART1, USART2, USART3, UART4 or UART5.

specifies the interrupt pending bit to clear. This parameter can be one of the following values:
USART_IT_CTS: CTS change interrupt (not available for UART4 and UART5)
USART_IT_LBD: LIN Break detection interrupt
USART_IT_TC: Transmission complete interrupt.
USART_IT_RXNE: Receive Data register not empty interrupt.

listitem.para: PE (Parity error), FE (Framing error), NE (Noise error), ORE (OverRun error) and IDLE (Idle line detected) pending bits are cleared by software sequence: a read operation to USART_SR register (USART_GetITStatus()) followed by a read operation to USART_DR register (USART_ReceiveData()).
RXNE pending bit can be also cleared by a read to the USART_DR register (USART_ReceiveData()).
TC pending bit can be also cleared by software sequence: a read operation to USART_SR register (USART_GetITStatus()) followed by a write operation to USART_DR register (USART_SendData()).
TXE pending bit is cleared only by a write to the USART_DR register (USART_SendData()).

briefdescription.para: This file provides all the USART firmware functions.

11-March-2011
THE PRESENT FIRMWARE WHICH IS FOR GUIDANCE ONLY AIMS AT PROVIDING CUSTOMERS WITH CODING INFORMATION REGARDING THEIR PRODUCTS IN ORDER FOR THEM TO SAVE TIME. AS A RESULT, STMICROELECTRONICS SHALL NOT BE HELD LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES WITH RESPECT TO ANY CLAIMS ARISING FROM THE CONTENT OF SUCH FIRMWARE AND/OR THE USE MADE BY CUSTOMERS OF THE CODING INFORMATION CONTAINED HEREIN IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR PRODUCTS.
